DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether efalizumab 1.0mg/kg give subcutaneous injection 12 week effective treat oral lichen planus . This 20 week , single center , open-label pilot study enroll 5 subject .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Effectiveness Efalizumab Treat Oral Lichen Planus
